snippet: With a new stress on achievements in civil rights and the legislative foundations of the Great Society, the LBJ Presidential Library is promoting a new assessment of President Johnson.
abstract: Edward Rothstein Critic's Notebook; LBJ Presidential Library in Austin, Tex, as part of three-day gathering to commemorate 50th anniversary of Civil Rights Act, is promoting new assessment of Pres Lyndon Baines Johnson, showing him and Abraham Lincoln as kindred spirits.
lead_paragraph: With a new stress on achievements in civil rights and the legislative foundations of the Great Society, the LBJ Presidential Library is promoting a new assessment of President Johnson.

headline.print_headline: Legacy Evolving at a Presidential Library
headline.seo: At the LBJ Presidential Library, Giving Nuance to History
headline.main: Legacy Evolving at a Presidential Library
